item.title: EchoSense: Frontal Haptic Navigation in VR towards Biomimetic Empathy
item.description: EchoSense presents a frontal haptic navigation system for VR environments that aims to foster biomimetic empathy. The system provides innovative haptic feedback for navigation, improving accessibility in virtual reality and enabling users to experience spatial awareness similar to biological echo-location.
